006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.configuration.DefaultConfiguration;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.configuration.IConfiguration;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.configuration.IMutableConfiguration;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.IDataTypeAdapter;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathException;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathExpression;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library.FnBoolean;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library.FnData;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.AbstractNodeItemVisitor;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IAssemblyNodeItem;
020import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IDefinitionNodeItem;
021import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IFieldNodeItem;
022import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IFlagNodeItem;
023import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IModuleNodeItem;
024import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.INodeItem;
025import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IAssemblyDefinition;
026import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IFieldDefinition;
027import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IFlagDefinition;
028import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CollectionUtil;
029import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;

031import org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair;
032import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
033import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;

035import java.util.ArrayList;
036import java.util.Collection;
037import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
038import java.util.LinkedList;
039import java.util.List;
040import java.util.Map;
041import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
042import java.util.regex.Pattern;

044import javax.xml.namespace.QName;

046import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
047import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;

049/**
050 * Used to perform constraint validation over one or more node items.
051 * <p>
052 * This class is not thread safe.
053 */
054@SuppressWarnings({
055    "PMD.CouplingBetweenObjects",
056    "PMD.GodClass" // provides validators for all types
057})
058public class DefaultConstraintValidator
059    implements IConstraintValidator, IMutableConfiguration<ValidationFeature<?>> { // NOPMD - intentional
060  private static final Logger LOGGER = LogManager.getLogger(DefaultConstraintValidator.class);
061
062  @NonNull
063  private final Map<INodeItem, ValueStatus> valueMap = new LinkedHashMap<>(); // NOPMD - intentional
064  @NonNull
065  private final Map<String, IIndex> indexNameToIndexMap = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
066  @NonNull
067  private final Map<String, List<KeyRef>> indexNameToKeyRefMap = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
068  @NonNull
069  private final IConstraintValidationHandler handler;
070  @NonNull
071  private final IMutableConfiguration<ValidationFeature<?>> configuration;
072
073  /**
074   * Construct a new constraint validator instance.
075   *
076   * @param handler
077   *          the validation handler to use for handling constraint violations
078   */
079  public DefaultConstraintValidator(
080      @NonNull IConstraintValidationHandler handler) {
081    this.handler = handler;
082    this.configuration = new DefaultConfiguration<>();
083  }
084
085  /**
086   * Get the current configuration of the serializer/deserializer.
087   *
088   * @return the configuration
089   */
090  @NonNull
091  protected IMutableConfiguration<ValidationFeature<?>> getConfiguration() {
092    return configuration;
093  }
094
095  @Override
096  public DefaultConstraintValidator enableFeature(ValidationFeature<?> feature) {
097    return set(feature, true);
098  }
099
100  @Override
101  public DefaultConstraintValidator disableFeature(ValidationFeature<?> feature) {
102    return set(feature, false);
103  }
104
105  @Override
106  public DefaultConstraintValidator applyConfiguration(
107      @NonNull IConfiguration<ValidationFeature<?>> other) {
108    getConfiguration().applyConfiguration(other);
109    return this;
110  }
111
112  @Override
113  public DefaultConstraintValidator set(ValidationFeature<?> feature, Object value) {
114    getConfiguration().set(feature, value);
115    return this;
116  }
117
118  @Override
119  public boolean isFeatureEnabled(ValidationFeature<?> feature) {
120    return getConfiguration().isFeatureEnabled(feature);
121  }
122
123  @Override
124  public Map<ValidationFeature<?>, Object> getFeatureValues() {
125    return getConfiguration().getFeatureValues();
126  }
127
128  /**
129   * Get the validation handler to use for handling constraint violations.
130   *
131   * @return the handler
132   */
133  @NonNull
134  protected IConstraintValidationHandler getConstraintValidationHandler() {
135    return handler;
136  }
137
138  @Override
139  public void validate(
140      @NonNull INodeItem item,
141      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
142    item.accept(new Visitor(), dynamicContext);
143  }
144
145  /**
146   * Validate the provided flag item against any associated constraints.
147   *
148   * @param item
149   *          the flag item to validate
150   * @param dynamicContext
151   *          the Metapath dynamic execution context to use for Metapath
152   *          evaluation
153   * @throws MetapathException
154   *           if an error occurred while evaluating a Metapath used in a
155   *           constraint
156   */
157  protected void validateFlag(
158      @NonNull IFlagNodeItem item,
159      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
160    IFlagDefinition definition = item.getDefinition();
161
162    validateExpect(definition.getExpectConstraints(), item, dynamicContext);
163    validateAllowedValues(definition.getAllowedValuesConstraints(), item, dynamicContext);
164    validateIndexHasKey(definition.getIndexHasKeyConstraints(), item, dynamicContext);
165    validateMatches(definition.getMatchesConstraints(), item, dynamicContext);
166  }
167
168  /**
169   * Validate the provided field item against any associated constraints.
170   *
171   * @param item
172   *          the field item to validate
173   * @param dynamicContext
174   *          the Metapath dynamic execution context to use for Metapath
175   *          evaluation
176   * @throws MetapathException
177   *           if an error occurred while evaluating a Metapath used in a
178   *           constraint
179   */
180  protected void validateField(
181      @NonNull IFieldNodeItem item,
182      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
183    IFieldDefinition definition = item.getDefinition();
184
185    validateExpect(definition.getExpectConstraints(), item, dynamicContext);
186    validateAllowedValues(definition.getAllowedValuesConstraints(), item, dynamicContext);
187    validateIndexHasKey(definition.getIndexHasKeyConstraints(), item, dynamicContext);
188    validateMatches(definition.getMatchesConstraints(), item, dynamicContext);
189  }
190
191  /**
192   * Validate the provided assembly item against any associated constraints.
193   *
194   * @param item
195   *          the assembly item to validate
196   * @param dynamicContext
197   *          the Metapath dynamic execution context to use for Metapath
198   *          evaluation
199   * @throws MetapathException
200   *           if an error occurred while evaluating a Metapath used in a
201   *           constraint
202   */
203  protected void validateAssembly(
204      @NonNull IAssemblyNodeItem item,
205      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
206    IAssemblyDefinition definition = item.getDefinition();
207
208    validateExpect(definition.getExpectConstraints(), item, dynamicContext);
209    validateAllowedValues(definition.getAllowedValuesConstraints(), item, dynamicContext);
210    validateIndexHasKey(definition.getIndexHasKeyConstraints(), item, dynamicContext);
211    validateMatches(definition.getMatchesConstraints(), item, dynamicContext);
212    validateHasCardinality(definition.getHasCardinalityConstraints(), item, dynamicContext);
213    validateIndex(definition.getIndexConstraints(), item, dynamicContext);
214    validateUnique(definition.getUniqueConstraints(), item, dynamicContext);
215  }
216
217  /**
218   * Evaluates the provided collection of {@code constraints} in the context of
219   * the {@code item}.
220   *
221   * @param constraints
222   *          the constraints to execute
223   * @param item
224   *          the focus of Metapath evaluation
225   * @param dynamicContext
226   *          the Metapath dynamic execution context to use for Metapath
227   *          evaluation
228   */
229  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidCatchingGenericException")
230  private void validateHasCardinality( // NOPMD false positive
231      @NonNull List<? extends ICardinalityConstraint> constraints,
232      @NonNull IAssemblyNodeItem item,
233      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
234    for (ICardinalityConstraint constraint : constraints) {
235      assert constraint != null;
236
237      try {
238        ISequence<? extends IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?>> targets = constraint.matchTargets(item, dynamicContext);
239        validateHasCardinality(constraint, item, targets, dynamicContext);
240      } catch (RuntimeException ex) {
241        handleError(constraint, item, ex, dynamicContext);
242      }
243    }
244  }
245
246  /**
247   * Evaluates the provided {@code constraint} against each of the
248   * {@code targets}.
249   *
250   * @param constraint
251   *          the constraint to execute
252   * @param node
253   *          the original focus of Metapath evaluation for identifying the
254   *          targets
255   * @param targets
256   *          the focus of Metapath evaluation for evaluating any constraint
257   *          Metapath clauses
258   */
259  private void validateHasCardinality(
260      @NonNull ICardinalityConstraint constraint,
261      @NonNull IAssemblyNodeItem node,
262      @NonNull ISequence<? extends INodeItem> targets,
263      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
264    int itemCount = targets.size();
265
266    IConstraintValidationHandler handler = getConstraintValidationHandler();
267
268    boolean violation = false;
269    Integer minOccurs = constraint.getMinOccurs();
270    if (minOccurs != null && itemCount < minOccurs) {
271      handler.handleCardinalityMinimumViolation(constraint, node, targets, dynamicContext);
272      violation = true;
273    }
274
275    Integer maxOccurs = constraint.getMaxOccurs();
276    if (maxOccurs != null && itemCount > maxOccurs) {
277      handler.handleCardinalityMaximumViolation(constraint, node, targets, dynamicContext);
278      violation = true;
279    }
280
281    if (!violation) {
282      handlePass(constraint, node, node, dynamicContext);
283    }
284  }
285
286  /**
287   * Evaluates the provided collection of {@code constraints} in the context of
288   * the {@code item}.
289   *
290   * @param constraints
291   *          the constraints to execute
292   * @param item
293   *          the focus of Metapath evaluation
294   * @param dynamicContext
295   *          the Metapath dynamic execution context to use for Metapath
296   *          evaluation
297   */
298  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidCatchingGenericException")
299  private void validateIndex(
300      @NonNull List<? extends IIndexConstraint> constraints,
301      @NonNull IAssemblyNodeItem item,
302      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
303    for (IIndexConstraint constraint : constraints) {
304      assert constraint != null;
305
306      try {
307        ISequence<? extends IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?>> targets = constraint.matchTargets(item, dynamicContext);
308        validateIndex(constraint, item, targets, dynamicContext);
309      } catch (RuntimeException ex) {
310        handleError(constraint, item, ex, dynamicContext);
311      }
312    }
313  }
314
315  /**
316   * Evaluates the provided {@code constraint} against each of the
317   * {@code targets}.
318   *
319   * @param constraint
320   *          the constraint to execute
321   * @param node
322   *          the original focus of Metapath evaluation for identifying the
323   *          targets
324   * @param targets
325   *          the focus of Metapath evaluation for evaluating any constraint
326   *          Metapath clauses
327   * @param dynamicContext
328   *          the Metapath dynamic execution context to use for Metapath
329   *          evaluation
330   */
331  private void validateIndex(
332      @NonNull IIndexConstraint constraint,
333      @NonNull IAssemblyNodeItem node,
334      @NonNull ISequence<? extends INodeItem> targets,
335      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
336    String indexName = constraint.getName();
337
338    IConstraintValidationHandler handler = getConstraintValidationHandler();
339    if (indexNameToIndexMap.containsKey(indexName)) {
340      handler.handleIndexDuplicateViolation(constraint, node, dynamicContext);
341    } else {
342      IIndex index = IIndex.newInstance(constraint.getKeyFields());
343      targets.stream()
344          .forEachOrdered(item -> {
345            assert item != null;
346            if (item.hasValue()) {
347              try {
348                INodeItem oldItem = index.put(item, dynamicContext);
349                if (oldItem == null) {
350                  handlePass(constraint, node, item, dynamicContext);
351                } else {
352                  handler.handleIndexDuplicateKeyViolation(constraint, node, oldItem, item, dynamicContext);
353                }
354              } catch (MetapathException ex) {
355                handler.handleKeyMatchError(constraint, node, item, ex, dynamicContext);
356              }
357            }
358          });
359      indexNameToIndexMap.put(indexName, index);
360    }
361  }
362
363  private void handlePass(
364      @NonNull IConstraint constraint,
365      @NonNull INodeItem node,
366      @NonNull INodeItem item,
367      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
368    if (isFeatureEnabled(ValidationFeature.VALIDATE_GENERATE_PASS_FINDINGS)) {
369      getConstraintValidationHandler().handlePass(constraint, node, item, dynamicContext);
370    }
371  }
372
373  private void handleError(
374      @NonNull IConstraint constraint,
375      @NonNull INodeItem node,
376      @NonNull Throwable ex,
377      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
378    getConstraintValidationHandler()
379        .handleError(constraint, node, toErrorMessage(constraint, node, ex), ex, dynamicContext);
380  }
381
382  @NonNull
383  private static String toErrorMessage(
384      @NonNull IConstraint constraint,
385      @NonNull INodeItem item,
386      @NonNull Throwable ex) {
387    StringBuilder builder = new StringBuilder(128);
388    builder.append("A ")
389        .append(constraint.getClass().getName())
390        .append(" constraint");
391
392    String id = constraint.getId();
393    if (id == null) {
394      builder.append(" targeting the metapath '")
395          .append(constraint.getTarget())
396          .append('\'');
397    } else {
398      builder.append(" with id '")
399          .append(id)
400          .append('\'');
401    }
402
403    builder.append(", matching the item at path '")
404        .append(item.getMetapath())
405        .append("', resulted in an unexpected error. The error was: ")
406        .append(ex.getLocalizedMessage());
407    return ObjectUtils.notNull(builder.toString());
408  }
409
410  /**
411   * Evaluates the provided collection of {@code constraints} in the context of
412   * the {@code item}.
413   *
414   * @param constraints
415   *          the constraints to execute
416   * @param item
417   *          the focus of Metapath evaluation
418   * @param dynamicContext
419   *          the Metapath dynamic execution context to use for Metapath
420   *          evaluation
421   */
422  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidCatchingGenericException")
423  private void validateUnique(
424      @NonNull List<? extends IUniqueConstraint> constraints,
425      @NonNull IAssemblyNodeItem item,
426      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
427    for (IUniqueConstraint constraint : constraints) {
428      assert constraint != null;
429
430      try {
431        ISequence<? extends IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?>> targets = constraint.matchTargets(item, dynamicContext);
432        validateUnique(constraint, item, targets, dynamicContext);
433      } catch (RuntimeException ex) {
434        handleError(constraint, item, ex, dynamicContext);
435      }
436    }
437  }
438
439  /**
440   * Evaluates the provided {@code constraint} against each of the
441   * {@code targets}.
442   *
443   * @param constraint
444   *          the constraint to execute
445   * @param node
446   *          the original focus of Metapath evaluation for identifying the
447   *          targets
448   * @param targets
449   *          the focus of Metapath evaluation for evaluating any constraint
450   *          Metapath clauses
451   * @param dynamicContext
452   *          the Metapath dynamic execution context to use for Metapath
453   *          evaluation
454   */
455  private void validateUnique(
456      @NonNull IUniqueConstraint constraint,
457      @NonNull IAssemblyNodeItem node,
458      @NonNull ISequence<? extends INodeItem> targets,
459      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
460
461    IConstraintValidationHandler handler = getConstraintValidationHandler();
462    IIndex index = IIndex.newInstance(constraint.getKeyFields());
463    targets.stream()
464        .forEachOrdered(item -> {
465          assert item != null;
466          if (item.hasValue()) {
467            try {
468              INodeItem oldItem = index.put(item, dynamicContext);
469              if (oldItem == null) {
470                handlePass(constraint, node, item, dynamicContext);
471              } else {
472                handler.handleUniqueKeyViolation(constraint, node, oldItem, item, dynamicContext);
473              }
474            } catch (MetapathException ex) {
475              handler.handleKeyMatchError(constraint, node, item, ex, dynamicContext);
476              throw ex;
477            }
478          }
479        });
480  }
481
482  /**
483   * Evaluates the provided collection of {@code constraints} in the context of
484   * the {@code item}.
485   *
486   * @param constraints
487   *          the constraints to execute
488   * @param item
489   *          the focus of Metapath evaluation
490   * @param dynamicContext
491   *          the Metapath dynamic execution context to use for Metapath
492   *          evaluation
493   */
494  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidCatchingGenericException")
495  private void validateMatches( // NOPMD false positive
496      @NonNull List<? extends IMatchesConstraint> constraints,
497      @NonNull IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?> item,
498      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
499
500    for (IMatchesConstraint constraint : constraints) {
501      assert constraint != null;
502
503      try {
504        ISequence<? extends IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?>> targets = constraint.matchTargets(item, dynamicContext);
505        validateMatches(constraint, item, targets, dynamicContext);
506      } catch (RuntimeException ex) {
507        handleError(constraint, item, ex, dynamicContext);
508      }
509    }
510  }
511
512  /**
513   * Evaluates the provided {@code constraint} against each of the
514   * {@code targets}.
515   *
516   * @param constraint
517   *          the constraint to execute
518   * @param node
519   *          the original focus of Metapath evaluation for identifying the
520   *          targets
521   * @param targets
522   *          the focus of Metapath evaluation for evaluating any constraint
523   *          Metapath clauses
524   */
525  private void validateMatches(
526      @NonNull IMatchesConstraint constraint,
527      @NonNull INodeItem node,
528      @NonNull ISequence<? extends INodeItem> targets,
529      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
530    targets.stream()
531        .forEachOrdered(item -> {
532          assert item != null;
533          if (item.hasValue()) {
534            validateMatchesItem(constraint, node, item, dynamicContext);
535          }
536        });
537  }
538
539  private void validateMatchesItem(
540      @NonNull IMatchesConstraint constraint,
541      @NonNull INodeItem node,
542      @NonNull INodeItem item,
543      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
544    String value = FnData.fnDataItem(item).asString();
545
546    IConstraintValidationHandler handler = getConstraintValidationHandler();
547    boolean valid = true;
548    Pattern pattern = constraint.getPattern();
549    if (pattern != null && !pattern.asMatchPredicate().test(value)) {
550      // failed pattern match
551      handler.handleMatchPatternViolation(constraint, node, item, value, pattern, dynamicContext);
552      valid = false;
553    }
554
555    IDataTypeAdapter<?> adapter = constraint.getDataType();
556    if (adapter != null) {
557      try {
558        adapter.parse(value);
559      } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
560        handler.handleMatchDatatypeViolation(constraint, node, item, value, adapter, ex, dynamicContext);
561        valid = false;
562      }
563    }
564
565    if (valid) {
566      handlePass(constraint, node, item, dynamicContext);
567    }
568  }
569
570  /**
571   * Evaluates the provided collection of {@code constraints} in the context of
572   * the {@code item}.
573   *
574   * @param constraints
575   *          the constraints to execute
576   * @param item
577   *          the focus of Metapath evaluation
578   * @param dynamicContext
579   *          the Metapath dynamic execution context to use for Metapath
580   *          evaluation
581   */
582  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidCatchingGenericException")
583  private void validateIndexHasKey( // NOPMD false positive
584      @NonNull List<? extends IIndexHasKeyConstraint> constraints,
585      @NonNull IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?> item,
586      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
587
588    for (IIndexHasKeyConstraint constraint : constraints) {
589      assert constraint != null;
590
591      try {
592        ISequence<? extends IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?>> targets = constraint.matchTargets(item, dynamicContext);
593        validateIndexHasKey(constraint, item, targets);
594      } catch (RuntimeException ex) {
595        handleError(constraint, item, ex, dynamicContext);
596      }
597    }
598  }
599
600  /**
601   * Evaluates the provided {@code constraint} against each of the
602   * {@code targets}.
603   *
604   * @param constraint
605   *          the constraint to execute
606   * @param node
607   *          the original focus of Metapath evaluation for identifying the
608   *          targets
609   * @param targets
610   *          the focus of Metapath evaluation for evaluating any constraint
611   *          Metapath clauses
612   */
613  private void validateIndexHasKey(
614      @NonNull IIndexHasKeyConstraint constraint,
615      @NonNull IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?> node,
616      @NonNull ISequence<? extends INodeItem> targets) {
617    String indexName = constraint.getIndexName();
618
619    List<KeyRef> keyRefItems = indexNameToKeyRefMap.get(indexName);
620    if (keyRefItems == null) {
621      keyRefItems = new LinkedList<>();
622      indexNameToKeyRefMap.put(indexName, keyRefItems);
623    }
624
625    KeyRef keyRef = new KeyRef(constraint, node, new ArrayList<>(targets.getValue()));
626    keyRefItems.add(keyRef);
627  }
628
629  /**
630   * Evaluates the provided collection of {@code constraints} in the context of
631   * the {@code item}.
632   *
633   * @param constraints
634   *          the constraints to execute
635   * @param item
636   *          the focus of Metapath evaluation
637   * @param dynamicContext
638   *          the Metapath dynamic execution context to use for Metapath
639   *          evaluation
640   */
641  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidCatchingGenericException")
642  private void validateExpect(
643      @NonNull List<? extends IExpectConstraint> constraints,
644      @NonNull IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?> item,
645      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
646    for (IExpectConstraint constraint : constraints) {
647      assert constraint != null;
648
649      try {
650        ISequence<? extends IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?>> targets = constraint.matchTargets(item, dynamicContext);
651        validateExpect(constraint, item, targets, dynamicContext);
652      } catch (RuntimeException ex) {
653        handleError(constraint, item, ex, dynamicContext);
654      }
655    }
656  }
657
658  /**
659   * Evaluates the provided {@code constraint} against each of the
660   * {@code targets}.
661   *
662   * @param constraint
663   *          the constraint to execute
664   * @param node
665   *          the original focus of Metapath evaluation for identifying the
666   *          targets
667   * @param targets
668   *          the focus of Metapath evaluation for evaluating any constraint
669   *          Metapath clauses
670   * @param dynamicContext
671   *          the Metapath dynamic execution context to use for Metapath
672   *          evaluation
673   */
674  private void validateExpect(
675      @NonNull IExpectConstraint constraint,
676      @NonNull INodeItem node,
677      @NonNull ISequence<? extends INodeItem> targets,
678      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
679    MetapathExpression metapath = MetapathExpression.compile(
680        constraint.getTest(),
681        dynamicContext.getStaticContext());
682
683    IConstraintValidationHandler handler = getConstraintValidationHandler();
684    targets.stream()
685        .forEachOrdered(item -> {
686          assert item != null;
687
688          if (item.hasValue()) {
689            try {
690              ISequence<?> result = metapath.evaluate(item, dynamicContext);
691              if (FnBoolean.fnBoolean(result).toBoolean()) {
692                handlePass(constraint, node, item, dynamicContext);
693              } else {
694                handler.handleExpectViolation(constraint, node, item, dynamicContext);
695              }
696            } catch (MetapathException ex) {
697              handleError(constraint, item, ex, dynamicContext);
698            }
699          }
700        });
701  }
702
703  /**
704   * Evaluates the provided collection of {@code constraints} in the context of
705   * the {@code item}.
706   *
707   * @param constraints
708   *          the constraints to execute
709   * @param item
710   *          the focus of Metapath evaluation
711   * @param dynamicContext
712   *          the Metapath dynamic execution context to use for Metapath
713   *          evaluation
714   */
715  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidCatchingGenericException")
716  private void validateAllowedValues(
717      @NonNull List<? extends IAllowedValuesConstraint> constraints,
718      @NonNull IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?> item,
719      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
720    for (IAllowedValuesConstraint constraint : constraints) {
721      assert constraint != null;
722      try {
723        ISequence<? extends IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?>> targets = constraint.matchTargets(item, dynamicContext);
724        validateAllowedValues(constraint, item, targets, dynamicContext);
725      } catch (RuntimeException ex) {
726        handleError(constraint, item, ex, dynamicContext);
727      }
728    }
729  }
730
731  /**
732   * Evaluates the provided {@code constraint} against each of the
733   * {@code targets}.
734   *
735   * @param constraint
736   *          the constraint to execute
737   * @param node
738   *          the original focus of Metapath evaluation for identifying the
739   *          targets
740   * @param targets
741   *          the focus of Metapath evaluation for evaluating any constraint
742   *          Metapath clauses
743   * @param dynamicContext
744   *          the Metapath dynamic execution context to use for Metapath
745   *          evaluation
746   */
747  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidCatchingGenericException")
748  private void validateAllowedValues(
749      @NonNull IAllowedValuesConstraint constraint,
750      @NonNull IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?> node,
751      @NonNull ISequence<? extends IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?>> targets,
752      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
753    targets.stream().forEachOrdered(item -> {
754      assert item != null;
755      if (item.hasValue()) {
756        try {
757          updateValueStatus(item, constraint, node);
758        } catch (RuntimeException ex) {
759          handleError(constraint, item, ex, dynamicContext);
760        }
761      }
762    });
763  }
764
765  /**
766   * Add a new allowed value to the value status tracker.
767   *
768   * @param targetItem
769   *          the item whose value is targeted by the constraint
770   * @param allowedValues
771   *          the allowed values constraint
772   * @param node
773   *          the original focus of Metapath evaluation for identifying the
774   *          targets
775   */
776  protected void updateValueStatus(
777      @NonNull INodeItem targetItem,
778      @NonNull IAllowedValuesConstraint allowedValues,
779      @NonNull IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?> node) {
780    // constraint.getAllowedValues().containsKey(value)
781
782    @Nullable ValueStatus valueStatus = valueMap.get(targetItem);
783    if (valueStatus == null) {
784      valueStatus = new ValueStatus(targetItem);
785      valueMap.put(targetItem, valueStatus);
786    }
787
788    valueStatus.registerAllowedValue(allowedValues, node);
789  }
790
791  /**
792   * Evaluate the value associated with the {@code targetItem} and update the
793   * status tracker.
794   *
795   * @param targetItem
796   *          the item whose value will be validated
797   * @param dynamicContext
798   *          the Metapath dynamic execution context to use for Metapath
799   *          evaluation
800   */
801  protected void handleAllowedValues(
802      @NonNull INodeItem targetItem,
803      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
804    ValueStatus valueStatus = valueMap.remove(targetItem);
805    if (valueStatus != null) {
806      valueStatus.validate(dynamicContext);
807    }
808  }
809
810  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidCatchingGenericException")
811  @Override
812  public void finalizeValidation(DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
813    // key references
814    for (Map.Entry<String, List<KeyRef>> entry : indexNameToKeyRefMap.entrySet()) {
815      String indexName = ObjectUtils.notNull(entry.getKey());
816      IIndex index = indexNameToIndexMap.get(indexName);
817
818      List<KeyRef> keyRefs = entry.getValue();
819
820      for (KeyRef keyRef : keyRefs) {
821        IIndexHasKeyConstraint constraint = keyRef.getConstraint();
822
823        INodeItem node = keyRef.getNode();
824        List<INodeItem> targets = keyRef.getTargets();
825        for (INodeItem item : targets) {
826          assert item != null;
827          try {
828            validateKeyRef(constraint, node, item, indexName, index, dynamicContext);
829          } catch (RuntimeException ex) {
830            handleError(constraint, item, ex, dynamicContext);
831          }
832        }
833      }
834    }
835  }
836
837  private void validateKeyRef(
838      @NonNull IIndexHasKeyConstraint constraint,
839      @NonNull INodeItem contextNode,
840      @NonNull INodeItem item,
841      @NonNull String indexName,
842      @Nullable IIndex index,
843      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
844    IConstraintValidationHandler handler = getConstraintValidationHandler();
845    try {
846      List<String> key = IIndex.toKey(item, constraint.getKeyFields(), dynamicContext);
847
848      if (index == null) {
849        handler.handleMissingIndexViolation(
850            constraint,
851            contextNode,
852            item,
853            ObjectUtils.notNull(String.format("Key reference to undefined index with name '%s'",
854                indexName)),
855            dynamicContext);
856      } else {
857        INodeItem referencedItem = index.get(key);
858
859        if (referencedItem == null) {
860          handler.handleIndexMiss(constraint, contextNode, item, key, dynamicContext);
861        } else {
862          handlePass(constraint, contextNode, item, dynamicContext);
863        }
864      }
865    } catch (MetapathException ex) {
866      handler.handleKeyMatchError(constraint, contextNode, item, ex, dynamicContext);
867    }
868  }
869
870  private class ValueStatus {
871    @NonNull
872    private final List<Pair<IAllowedValuesConstraint, IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?>>> constraints = new LinkedList<>();
873    @NonNull
874    private final String value;
875    @NonNull
876    private final INodeItem item;
877    private boolean allowOthers = true;
878    @NonNull
879    private IAllowedValuesConstraint.Extensible extensible = IAllowedValuesConstraint.Extensible.EXTERNAL;
880
881    public ValueStatus(@NonNull INodeItem item) {
882      this.item = item;
883      this.value = FnData.fnDataItem(item).asString();
884    }
885
886    public void registerAllowedValue(
887        @NonNull IAllowedValuesConstraint allowedValues,
888        @NonNull IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?> node) {
889      this.constraints.add(Pair.of(allowedValues, node));
890      if (!allowedValues.isAllowedOther()) {
891        // record the most restrictive value
892        allowOthers = false;
893      }
894
895      IAllowedValuesConstraint.Extensible newExtensible = allowedValues.getExtensible();
896      if (newExtensible.ordinal() > extensible.ordinal()) {
897        // record the most restrictive value
898        extensible = allowedValues.getExtensible();
899      } else if (IAllowedValuesConstraint.Extensible.NONE.equals(newExtensible)
900          && IAllowedValuesConstraint.Extensible.NONE.equals(extensible)) {
901        // this is an error, where there are two none constraints that conflict
902        throw new MetapathException(
903            String.format("Multiple constraints have extensibility scope=none at path '%s'", item.getMetapath()));
904      } else if (allowedValues.getExtensible().ordinal() < extensible.ordinal()) {
905        String msg = String.format(
906            "An allowed values constraint with an extensibility scope '%s'"
907                + " exceeds the allowed scope '%s' at path '%s'",
908            allowedValues.getExtensible().name(), extensible.name(), item.getMetapath());
909        LOGGER.atError().log(msg);
910        throw new MetapathException(msg);
911      }
912    }
913
914    public void validate(@NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
915      if (!constraints.isEmpty()) {
916        boolean match = false;
917        List<IAllowedValuesConstraint> failedConstraints = new LinkedList<>();
918        IConstraintValidationHandler handler = getConstraintValidationHandler();
919        for (Pair<IAllowedValuesConstraint, IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?>> pair : constraints) {
920          IAllowedValuesConstraint allowedValues = pair.getLeft();
921          IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?> node = ObjectUtils.notNull(pair.getRight());
922          IAllowedValue matchingValue = allowedValues.getAllowedValue(value);
923          if (matchingValue != null) {
924            match = true;
925            handlePass(allowedValues, node, item, dynamicContext);
926          } else if (IAllowedValuesConstraint.Extensible.NONE.equals(allowedValues.getExtensible())) {
927            // hard failure, since no other values can satisfy this constraint
928            failedConstraints = CollectionUtil.singletonList(allowedValues);
929            match = false;
930            break;
931          } else {
932            failedConstraints.add(allowedValues);
933          } // this constraint passes, but we need to make sure other constraints do as well
934        }
935
936        // it's not a failure if allow others is true
937        if (!match && !allowOthers) {
938          handler.handleAllowedValuesViolation(failedConstraints, item, dynamicContext);
939        }
940      }
941    }
942  }
943
944  class Visitor
945      extends AbstractNodeItemVisitor<DynamicContext, Void> {
946
947    @NonNull
948    private DynamicContext handleLetStatements(
949        @NonNull INodeItem focus,
950        @NonNull Map<QName, ILet> letExpressions,
951        @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
952
953      DynamicContext retval;
954      Collection<ILet> lets = letExpressions.values();
955      if (lets.isEmpty()) {
956        retval = dynamicContext;
957      } else {
958        final DynamicContext subContext = dynamicContext.subContext();
959
960        for (ILet let : lets) {
961          QName name = let.getName();
962          ISequence<?> result = let.getValueExpression().evaluate(focus, subContext);
963
964          // ensure the sequence is list backed
965          result.getValue();
966
967          subContext.bindVariableValue(name, result);
968        }
969        retval = subContext;
970      }
971      return retval;
972    }
973
974    @Override
975    public Void visitFlag(@NonNull IFlagNodeItem item, DynamicContext context) {
976      assert context != null;
977
978      IFlagDefinition definition = item.getDefinition();
979      DynamicContext effectiveContext = handleLetStatements(item, definition.getLetExpressions(), context);
980
981      validateFlag(item, effectiveContext);
982      super.visitFlag(item, effectiveContext);
983      handleAllowedValues(item, context);
984      return null;
985    }
986
987    @Override
988    public Void visitField(@NonNull IFieldNodeItem item, DynamicContext context) {
989      assert context != null;
990
991      IFieldDefinition definition = item.getDefinition();
992      DynamicContext effectiveContext = handleLetStatements(item, definition.getLetExpressions(), context);
993
994      validateField(item, effectiveContext);
995      super.visitField(item, effectiveContext);
996      handleAllowedValues(item, context);
997      return null;
998    }
999
1000    @Override
1001    public Void visitAssembly(@NonNull IAssemblyNodeItem item, DynamicContext context) {
1002      assert context != null;
1003
1004      IAssemblyDefinition definition = item.getDefinition();
1005      DynamicContext effectiveContext = handleLetStatements(item, definition.getLetExpressions(), context);
1006
1007      validateAssembly(item, effectiveContext);
1008      super.visitAssembly(item, effectiveContext);
1009      return null;
1010    }
1011
1012    @Override
1013    public Void visitMetaschema(@NonNull IModuleNodeItem item, DynamicContext context) {
1014      throw new UnsupportedOperationException("not needed");
1015    }
1016
1017    @Override
1018    protected Void defaultResult() {
1019      // no result value
1020      return null;
1021    }
1022  }
1023
1024  private static class KeyRef {
1025    @NonNull
1026    private final IIndexHasKeyConstraint constraint;
1027    @NonNull
1028    private final INodeItem node;
1029    @NonNull
1030    private final List<INodeItem> targets;
1031
1032    public KeyRef(
1033        @NonNull IIndexHasKeyConstraint constraint,
1034        @NonNull INodeItem node,
1035        @NonNull List<INodeItem> targets) {
1036      this.node = node;
1037      this.constraint = constraint;
1038      this.targets = targets;
1039    }
1040
1041    @NonNull
1042    public IIndexHasKeyConstraint getConstraint() {
1043      return constraint;
1044    }
1045
1046    @NonNull
1047    protected INodeItem getNode() {
1048      return node;
1049    }
1050
1051    @NonNull
1052    public List<INodeItem> getTargets() {
1053      return targets;
1054    }
1055  }
1056}
